snippet: Gov. Bob McDonnell of Virginia signed a law that repealed a gun purchase limit that had effectively cut into underground dealing. So much for protecting his citizens.
abstract: Editorial scores Virginia Gov Bob McDonnell for signing a law repealing the gun purchase limit that had effectively cut into the state's notorious underground gun sales; holds McDonnell's decision ignores voter sentiment in Virginia and the repeated gun tragedies that have occurred across the nation.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Bob McDonnell of Virginia signed a law that repealed a gun purchase limit that had effectively cut into underground dealing. So much for protecting his citizens.
